title: Here’s who the upcoming ‘special guest’ Bernie Sanders’ teased at the #DemDebate is reported to be (anybody surprised?)
text:
At Tuesday night’s Democrat debate in Ohio, Bernie Sanders teased a big endorsement set to take place over the weekend in New York City:

Sanders teases the "special guest" his campaign is planning on having at his NYC Rally on Saturday. Any guesses? #DemDebate — Gary Grumbach (@GaryGrumbach) October 16, 2019

We need a political revolution and the American people are ready for one. Join our rally in New York this weekend with a special guest:https://t.co/nyqtMVEcXQ — Bernie Sanders (@BernieSanders) October 16, 2019

It’s being reported that endorsement is a fellow Green New Deal proponent and socialist fellow traveler:

🚨SCOOP with @WaPoSean: @AOC is the "special guest"

at @BernieSanders's Queens rally, and is expected to support him for president.🚨https://t.co/H1I9woghzG — Dave Weigel (@daveweigel) October 16, 2019

NEWS: @AOC plans to endorse @berniesanders and appear with him at a rally in Queens, NY, on Saturday. Huge moment in the 2020 race. Story with @daveweigel: https://t.co/SloYtRUEYw — Sean Sullivan (@WaPoSean) October 16, 2019

JUST IN: Bernie Sanders’ campaign confirms to @scottdetrow that he will receive the endorsement of Democratic Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez when she joins him as a guest at a campaign rally in Queens on Saturday. — NPR Politics (@nprpolitics) October 16, 2019

A source in the Sanders campaign confirms that @AOC will join @BernieSanders for his rally in NYC this weekend- the “special guest” he touted earlier. — Elizabeth Landers (@ElizLanders) October 16, 2019

.@AOC plans to endorse @BernieSanders – and will be his teased “special guest” at his rally in NYC this weekend, two senior Sanders campaign sources confirm @maryaliceparks @ABCPolitics @ABC — Sasha Pezenik (@SashaPezenik) October 16, 2019

What a perfect fit!

Sanders: we’ll be having a special guest at our Queens event Everyone in NY: !!?!!!?? pic.twitter.com/zSOx2DHhTD — Diana (@diianaafloress) October 16, 2019

Does this help him in Iowa or NH? https://t.co/otRQE02qoF — Philip Klein (@philipaklein) October 16, 2019

What a surprise.

***

Related:

OUCH! Tulsi Gabbard smacks CNN and NY Times at the #DemDebate (that’s sponsored by CNN and NYT)

Joe Biden wants those clipping coupons in the stock market to pay their fair share

Elizabeth Warren refuses to say if taxes will go up under her Medicare-for-All plan, gets ‘CALLED OUT’ by Pete Buttigieg
